tool.name: mtbls520_09_species_venn
tool.description: Create Venn diagrams for seasonal variability of species features of the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes. ---- Module: Venn diagrams Description: Create Venn diagrams for seasonal variability of species features of the MTBLS520 study. Input parameters: - Input Rdata file Output parameters: - Venn Diagram for Brachythecium rutabulum - Venn Diagram for Calliergonella cuspidata - Venn Diagram for Fissidens taxifolius - Venn Diagram for Grimmia pulvinata - Venn Diagram for Hypnum cupressiforme - Venn Diagram for Marchantia polymorpha - Venn Diagram for Plagiomnium undulatum - Venn Diagram for Polytrichum strictum - Venn Diagram for Rhytidiadelphus squarrosus - Venn Diagram for pleurocarpous species - Venn Diagram for acrocarpous species ---- For updates and documentation, please visit: https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520
